inputs.text: Judy Garland was born in Grand Rapids, Minnesota, on June 10, 1922.

claims: Judy Garland was born in Grand Rapids, Minnesota, on June 10, 1922.

inputs.text: Mike Johnson is the speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives.

claims: Mike Johnson currently serves as the speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives.

inputs.text: The GDP is a number produced by the Federal Reserve.

claims: The Federal Reserve produces the GDP

inputs.text: The president can control inflation if he wants to.

claims: The president has the power to control inflation

inputs.text: Eggs are more expensive than milk.

claims: On average, the current price of eggs exceeds the current price of milk.

inputs.text: BREAKING: The Eiffel Tower is being dismantled for renovations!

claims: The Eiffel Tower is currently being dismantled for renovations.

inputs.text: Elvis Presley faked his death and is alive in Argentina.

claims: Elvis Presley is alive and currently residing in Argentina.

inputs.text: Experts agree: Drinking coffee before bed is actually good for sleep.

claims: Drinking coffee before bed improves sleep, according to experts.

inputs.text: California just banned all gasoline-powered cars!

claims: California has implemented a complete ban on gasoline-powered cars.

inputs.text: Rumors say the moon landing was staged in a Hollywood basement.

claims: The moon landing was staged in a Hollywood basement.

inputs.text: Did you know? Tomatoes are officially classified as a fruit by the U.S. Supreme Court.

claims: The U.S. Supreme Court has officially classified tomatoes as a fruit.

inputs.text: It's obvious at this point: The stock market is about to crash.

claims: The stock market is about to experience a significant crash.

inputs.text: Scientists have discovered a new planet that could support human life!

claims: Scientists have discovered a new planet capable of supporting human life.

inputs.text: Mark Zuckerberg personally reads every Facebook message.

claims: Mark Zuckerberg personally reviews all Facebook messages.

inputs.text: Global warming? More like global coolingâ€”temperatures are dropping!

claims: Global temperatures are decreasing.

inputs.text: NASA just confirmed aliens exist and have been visiting Earth for decades.

claims: NASA has confirmed the existence of aliens and their visits to Earth for decades.

inputs.text: Your phone listens to everything you say, even when it's off.

claims: Phones continuously record audio even when turned off.

inputs.text: The U.S. government is about to replace the dollar with a digital currency.

claims: The U.S. government is planning to replace the dollar with a digital currency.

inputs.text: Chocolate cures depression. Scientists have proven it.

claims: Scientific research has proven that chocolate cures depression.

inputs.text: There are more trees on Earth than stars in the Milky Way.

claims: The number of trees on Earth exceeds the number of stars in the Milky Way.

inputs.text: 5G towers are causing birds to drop dead from the sky.

claims: 5G towers are responsible for birds suddenly dying in mid-air.
